883320.name: Runes of Magic – Dragon Adventure Pack
883320.description:
There’ll be nothing standing between you and your heroic career with the exclusive Dragon Adventure Pack with permanent bag space, fiery mount, Puss-in-Boots, huge costume set and more!

Contents:

Scarlet Fire Dragon Mount (Permanent)This imposing beast carries you and another comrade to the farthest corners of Taborea.

Puss-in-Boots Pet Egg
Set out on your adventure with Puss-in-Boots as your loyal companion.

Grinning Rogue Costume BundleClothes make heroes – impress allies and opponents alike in this costume set.

Sword Soul
Make a mighty impression with extraordinary spirit sword wings.

High Quality Leather Backpack III, IV, V and VI
Permanently unlock backpack slots III to VI.

Important:
  • The items will be tied to the account you use to log into the game after purchase.
  • Then visit the shop in the game and open your depot to send the items to your inventory.
  • You can only purchase the DLC once per account.
883320.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语
